name: Stukov simulator: Asteroid belt
description:
Stukov has drunk too much vodka and has steered the Aleksander right into an asteroid belt!

A fast paced action dodgin game that gets progressivly more difficult. 

If you get hit by two meteors, you DIE!

Can you survive longer than your friends (if you have any)?

(Just a test project. I know the no button on restart does nothing but it's fun and challenging anyway :))
